name: Rusted Vengeance
description:
Rusted Vengeance is a rpg/fighting game. Clyde Steel is trying to explore a mysterious floating city, battle off against enemies, and to figure out their purpose in this world.

This project was developed by the members of the ISU Game Development Club in the Fall of 2021. For more information on how to get involved with the club, reference the contact information on the following page: https://redbirdlife.illinoisstate.edu/organization/gdc
